title: Beijing government releases list of spots to enjoy city's red leaves
text:
By DU JUAN | chinadaily.com.cn | Updated: 2019-10-22 17:58

Citizens in Beijing enjoy the city's autumn views. [Photo provided to chinadaily.com.cn]

The Beijing municipal government has picked the 16 best places for enjoying red leaves in the city, covering all the districts in the capital.

Autumn is considered the best season in the capital, with great view of various tree types.

To provide a convenient way for citizens to enjoy the views, the city government will put information for the parks online, with special attention given to areas with leaf color changes.
